title: NormaCS 1-6 DVD - Russian standarts

The program is designed to store, search and display text and details of regulatory documents, as well as the standards applied in the territory of the Russian Federation and regulating the activity of enterprises of different industries. 

NormaCS provides authentic texts of legal and technical documents stored in a database program. The completeness and relevance of the database, thoughtful interface and convenient mechanism for displaying information can solve any problems connected with the search of the instrument. The high level of service provided to users of the program, offer advantages attributive and full database, the availability of image copies of the official publication of documents and breadth of coverage of various industries. Now communicate with office products and other accounting-graphic-aided design programs, developed by CSoft Development. 

NormaCS gives the user a wide range of tools and features: 
Information completeness 
Authoritative texts they were receiving from the institutions - the developers of standards. 
The universal information space regulations and standards, regardless of the number of installed bases, cross-movement of hyperlinks. 
Graphic display signs of the status of a document (in effect, no effect, the draft). 
Ample opportunity for the various databases. 
The completeness of coverage of rules and standards applied in different industries (in database software, including more than 27 thousand GOSTov and many other documents). 
The total number of cards documents exceeds 55 thousand, a number of texts - 43 thousand. 
The storage and display of amendments and changes to the text of the document. 
The possibility of analyzing the document links with other regulations and standards. 
Access to the norms and standards in on-line. 
Trace Simplify norms and standards (user programs do not have to deal with requests for information centers of various ministries and departments). 
The ability to create and maintain custom folders with the support of the hierarchy. 
Regular information services (the user selects the frequency of update information contained in the database). 
Support for current status of instruments (cancellations documents are not removed from the database and can be used as background material). 

Ample opportunities for searching documents 
High speed retrieval of attributes (name, type, index, number, name of the organization adopted the document as well as keywords, dates of entry, approval, etc.). 
Search by title, taking into account the morphology of Russian language 
Intelligent search by ID 
Search multiple indexes and organizations and creating teams to re-use 
Full-text search (including text). 
Search by subject, to which a document classified in accordance with the classification. 
The ability to create search queries. 
Preparation of samples for multiple conditions (including attachments). 
Using conventional and expanded search options. 
Through search all connected databases based on any, even the snatches of the document that helps you find the necessary documents for a few seconds. 
The possibility of transition to a classifier, where before it found the document. 
Storage of previous searches. 
The possibility of output to print. 

Integration with office and design applications 
Citation of documents (text, pictures, tables) in office applications. 
The export documents in Microsoft Word by pressing a button. 
Export documents in OpenOffice.org Writer a single click. 
Copying images of pages of graphics copy via the clipboard. 
Opening of legal documents through hyperlinks from the user&#039;s documents Word, Ehsel, Autocad drawings and any other applications. 
Automatic placement of links to legal documents in MS Word. 
Checking the validity of links. 
Search on the basis of legal documents directly from office applications. 
Work is under way to integrate with OpenOffice. 
Create your own database of documents / organization. 
Efforts to reconcile with the system documentation TDMS. 

Features Interface 
The interface is set up in accordance with the wishes of the user. 
The ability to customize the display details (card) document. 
Various service opportunities (sorting papers on various attributes in the sections on search results, customizable user environments, different filters). 
Displaying the document in the form of printed pages, or hypertext. 
Rotation, smoothing, scaling graphics document. 
The unique system to improve the quality of bad printed originals. 
Setting the format and type of display columns containing a list of documents in the classifier, and search results. 
Work in the single and online (in turn subdivided into line Intranet-and Internet-options). 
Conservation workers settings when you exit the program. 
The history of access and selected papers. 
A single interface for local, network and Internet-versions. 

Features online 
"Floating" license 
Priorities and the delineation of user access 
History and audit 
Safety data on the server 
The minimum burden on the administrator
